title: Completed Machine Learning & Data Science Course!
content: Excited to share that I've completed the Complete Machine Learning & Data Science course from GeeksforGeeks! This journey strengthened my foundation in ML and DS, and Iâ€™m looking forward to applying these skills in real-world projects. #MachineLearning #DataScience #GeeksforGeeks

title: American Superstore Sales Analysis with Tableau
content: Analyzed American superstore sales data using Tableau. Explored business metrics like sales, profit, and discounts across categories and regions. Key features: Choropleth Map, Sales vs. Profit Analysis, Donut Charts, Histogram, Dynamic Filters, and Pages shelf. Presented actionable insights for businesses and improved my data visualization skills. #Tableau #DataAnalytics #BusinessIntelligence

title: COVID-19 Data Visualization Project
content: Analyzed COVID-19 data from the first six months of the pandemic using Tableau. Key features: Choropleth Map, Dual Axis Line Chart, Race Bar Chart, Filters, and Dashboards. Presented global case trends and insights interactively. Enhanced my data storytelling and analytical skills. #Tableau #DataVisualization #COVID19Analysis
